trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around September 17th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving South on I-5 and saw a bright white light in the sky that was stationary. I saw it from about two miles away, and thought it was a helicopter at first, but as I passed it, the position in the sky and the movement made me think otherwise. I had a good view of it and could not see anything other than the light, surrounded by the night sky; I would have expected to see a glimpse of the outline of a helicopter. It appeared to only be one hundred feet or so off the ground (about the height of a near by cell antenna), at that height I really would have expected to see a helicopter. At the best viewpoint I had, the light appeared to the rotating vertically.
Summary: Bright white light over I-5 outside of Salem
